title: FBA Fulfillment Customer Shipment Replacement Data
description: FBA Fulfillment Customer Shipment Replacement Data Reports

shipment-date.description: Date and time of the free replacement shipment in DD-MON-YYYY format
shipment-date.title: Date

sku.description: Unique identifier of the item used by the seller
sku.title: Merchant SKU

fulfillment-center-id.description: ID of the fulfillment center shipping this unit
fulfillment-center-id.title: Warehouse ID

original-fulfillment-center-id.description: ID of the original fulfillment center shipping the free replaced item
original-fulfillment-center-id.title: Original Warehouse ID

quantity.description: Number of units shipped in the replacement shipment
quantity.title: Quantity

replacement-reason-code.description: Code indicating the reason for the replacement
replacement-reason-code.title: Replacement Reason Code

replacement-customer-order-id.description: Order ID of the replacement order for the original item
replacement-customer-order-id.title: Replacement Customer Order Id

original-amazon-order-id.description: Order ID of the original shipment for the replacement item
original-amazon-order-id.title: Original Customer Order ID

dataEndTime.description: End time of the data collection period
